name: Elevated Synapses
description: In contrast to initial reports, we've now identified increased development in the social centers as well. This isn't simply a regressor failure, but actual development beyond baseline.
author: Report on project 'Profecto', Exodyne Biotech

name: Additional Expenditures
description: What's ridiculous isn't that they're demanding all these things, goodness knows I would. No, what's ridiculous is that we give it to them! Tri-Tachyon doesn't have to lavish luxuries on their AIs, and we think we can compete with them?
author: Neil Morris, Exodyne Biotech accounting department

name: Virtual Augments
description: It's not a question of performance, brains are startlingly impressive computers. It's a question of compilation, and we have the theory to achieve that.
author: Rejected project proposal, Exodyne Biotech

name: Predictive Checklists
description: I know it's a little complicated, so why don't you try following the instructions and call for me if you get confused, okay girls?
author: "Laisa", XBS Rellrait security recording, c126.08.03

name: Prioritized Allocation
description: V423 has a full queue. Assign to V264 and schedule one-week inspection with V809 to identify any faults in the repair.
author: "Laisa", XBS Rellrait maintenance log, c78.03.18

name: Hypercognitive Assistance
description: waiting. omega signal query? scanning. are you the maker?
author: Octarine Resplendent, alpha
